types.description: Any instance can be positively described as the intersection of any number of ontology classes.

id.description: A unique ontology class identifier, can be either URI or CURIE

label.description: A string that contains the preferred natural language term to denote the class

negated_types.description: Any instance can be assigned any number of negative classes.

description.description: An optional free text description that can enhance the ontology class based description

has_location.description: the location in an organism or cell in which the phenotype manifests

types.description: Any instance can be positively described as the intersection of any number of ontology classes.

negated_types.description: Any instance can be assigned any number of negative classes.

description.description: An optional free text description that can enhance the ontology class based description

attribute_of.description: the entity which this phenotype is about -- normally bundled into ontology class

onset.description: the time region in which the condition is first manifest

types.description: Any instance can be positively described as the intersection of any number of ontology classes.

negated_types.description: Any instance can be assigned any number of negative classes.

description.description: An optional free text description that can enhance the ontology class based description

start_time.description: the date or time at which the interval starts

end_time.description: the date or time at which the interval ends

offset.description: the time region in which the condition ceases to manifest

severity.description: the degree to which the phenotype is manifest, related to the concept of expressivity, see http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/books/NBK22090/

types.description: Any instance can be positively described as the intersection of any number of ontology classes.

negated_types.description: Any instance can be assigned any number of negative classes.

description.description: An optional free text description that can enhance the ontology class based description

environment.description: the environment in which the phenotype is expressed

negated_types.description: Any instance can be assigned any number of negative classes.

description.description: An optional free text description that can enhance the ontology class based description
